extensionDescription.message: A helpful companion for web browsing, an intelligent assistant for surfing the internet

textareaPlaceholder.message: Enter your message, press Enter to send

settingsDomainDescription.message: This is the complete request address for the backend service, e.g., https://api.openai.com/v1

settingsOllamaModelTypeDescription.message: Requires starting Ollama service with the command: OLLAMA_ORIGINS=chrome-extension://* ollama serve

settingsApikeyDescription.message: This is the request key for the backend service, e.g., sk-xxxxxx, obtained from the backend service

settingsModelDescription.message: This is the model name for the backend service, e.g., davinci, obtained from the backend service

settingsModelNameOllamaDescription.message: Not all models support chat mode

settingsApikeyError.message: Please enter a valid API Key

sidepanelDomainErrorDescription.message: Please enter a valid request domain

summaryDescription.message: Summarize the main content of the current page

settingsSystemPromptDescription.message: This prompt only works in the AI chat bar

settingsSummatyPromptDescription.message: This prompt only works for the summary button function

chatErrorMessage.message: Not connected to the server. Correct model configuration is required. Please click

settingsModelsDescription.message: Manage all your model information. Model information is only saved locally.

settingsPromptsDescription.message: Manage all your prompt information. Prompt information is only saved locally.

sureAboutDeletingThisModel.message: Are you sure you want to delete this model?
